page.title: 05LAGOONS
page.content: THE MANAGER OF{ALCAN}HAS SENT A LETTER TO OUR HEADMASTER TO WARN THE CHILDREN OF NEWBIGGIN'S MOORSIDE FIRST SCHOOL NOT TO GO NEAR AND NOT TO PLAY NEAR THE LAGOONS ,THE PEOPLE AT ALCAN CALL THEM SETTLING PONDS.SOME CHILDREN HAVE BEEN REALLY STUPID USING THE LAGOONS AS PADDLING POOLS. IT IS VERY DANGEROUS TO PLAY ON THE LAGOONS BECAUSE IF YOU SINK TROUGH THE CRUST OF THE LAGOONS YOU WILL SINK 25FT AND THE CHANCE OF GETTING YOU OUT IS NIL. PEOPLE WANT TO BREAK THROUGH THE FENCE TO GET TO THE LAGOONS,THEY DO NOT TAKE ANY NOTICE OF THE DANGER SIGNS.THEY BREAK UP THE SIGNS AND STEAL THE LIFE JACKETS THAT ARE PUT THERE FOR ADDITIONAL SAFETY. THE LAGOONS CONTAIN WASTE ASH LEFT AFTER THE{ALUMINIUM}HAS BEEN SMELTED.
